law.catch_line: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Funding" includes any form of assurance, guarantee, grant payment, credit, tax credit, or other assistance.
"Vehicle parking facility" has the meaning stated in § 4-101 of this article.

text.section:
A vehicle parking facility shall allow motorcycles to park in the facility, subject to the charges established by the facility, if:
The facility is owned, operated, or leased by the State or a political subdivision of the State; or
The facility receives funding from the State or a political subdivision of the State.
